emuInput.TitMainTitle: William Porter standing in Budweiser Beer booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 19 reads: "5. William Porter, national representative for the Anhauser-Busch, Inc. awaits crowds in Budweiser Beer booth."
